page.title: 01 MORPETH
page.content: {Morpeth}(population 14,750) is the{ {County Town}for{Northumberland}and is situated some 15 miles north of{ {Newcastle Upon Tyne.}It is a market town serving a wide rural area for shopping and other basic services,and in recent years it has developed as a residential area. {Morpeth}lies in the{Wansbeck Valley} surrounded by wooded slopes and it is only in recent years that the town has spread beyond the river valley.Today Morpeth combines the charm and character of an historic market town with modern housing,shops,offices and factories for light industries.The town centre retains its{medieval} street pattern with many buildings of historical and architectural interest. Within easy reach is the beautiful {Northumberland coast and countryside} with many reminders of the past.
